name: Android NCU Injector
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The NCU Injector adds 150 NCU to your pet. The Permafrost Melting Tool is a reward for quests in Penumbra and Frozen Android NCU drops in Alappaa. #L "Permafrost Melting Tool" "269805" Note:To build your Permafrost Melting Tool, go here: #L "Permafrost Melting Tool" "/tell recipe 763" #L "Frozen Android NCU Injector" "269841" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Permafrost Melting Tool + Frozen Android NCU Injector = #L "Android NCU Injector" "269840" Skills: | ME 1200 |
